entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 08:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
